attributes.action:
Temporarily Release Remanded Prisoners 
That we’re set to trial during COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
Prisoners could be being held in prisons at risk of catching the disease or loosing loved ones,  if there court cases was to go ahead of a judge they would be able to prove there innocence and would be home. 
On behalf of prisoners families we urge you to release our loved ones at these very difficult times where family means everything.
NOBODY WANTS TO LOOSE A LOVED ONE
INNOCENT UNTIL PROVEN GUILTY!
attributes.background: REMANDED PRISONERS THAT WE’RE DUE TO TRIAL DURING THE LATEST PANDEMIC OR BEEN PUSHED BACK SHOULD BE RELEASE ON A TAG OR CURFEW BASIS TO PREVENT BEING HELD IN PRISONS UNDER FALSE ACCUSATIONS!! UNLESS SUFFICIENT EVIDENCE PROVES OTHERWISE
